original_text: After King Hezekiah had done all these good things, King Sennacherib of Assyria attacked Judah. He put his soldiers in camps around all the strong cities in Judah. He wanted to take the cities for himself.
korean_text: 이 모든 충성된 일을 한 후에 앗수르 왕 산헤립이 유다에 들어와서 견고한 성읍들을 향하여 진을 치고 쳐서 점령하고자 한지라

sentences.original_text: After King Hezekiah had done all these good things
sentences.korean_translation: 히스기야 왕이 이 모든 좋은 일을 행한 후에

sentences.original_text: King Sennacherib of Assyria attacked Judah
He put his soldiers in camps
around all the strong cities in Judah
He wanted to take the cities for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 도시들을 자신을 위해 차지하고 싶었다
